title: “Orthodoxy, Autocracy and Nationality” — How Russia’s history molded Putin’s worldview
description:
Michael Hirsh, a senior correspondent at Foreign Policy has gotten us all thinking with his column, “Putin’s thousand-year war.”

 

Read more here: https://foreignpolicy.com/2022/03/12/putins-thousand-year-war/
